DOC.brief_summary: Endometrial scratching in luteal phase of a spontaneous menstrual cycle may increase pregnancy rate in women with unexplained infertility.
DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Scratching in Couples With Unexplained Subfertility
DOC.criteria: women aged between 20 and 39 years with at least one year of infertility regular menstruation with the length of the cycle between 2234 days and ovulation confirmed by appropriately timed midluteal progesterone fertile semen variables bilateral tubal patency (demonstrated by laparoscopy or hysterosalpingography).
DOC.keyword: effect of endometrial biopsy (scratching) on clinical pregnancy rates in women with unexplained infertility
